name: RPBroadcastControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement to respond to changes in a live broadcast.

items.name: func broadcastController(RPBroadcastController, didFinishWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a broadcast ended due to an error.

items.name: func broadcastController(RPBroadcastController, didUpdateServiceInfo: [String : NSCoding & NSObjectProtocol])
items.desc: Tells the delegate the broadcast service has data to pass back to the broadcasting app.

items.name: func broadcastController(RPBroadcastController, didUpdateBroadcast: URL)
items.desc: Tells the broadcast service the broadcast URL has been updated.
